About Me

I am a Ph.D. researcher at TU Dublin, Ireland
My research focuses on Privacy-preserving Pedestrian Behaviour Analysis.

Work Experience

  • Product Lead - Cognition World Pvt Ltd , Ireland - [Jul 2021 - Present]
  • Research Assistant - University of Lincoln , United Kingdom - [Sep 2019 - Jun 2020]
  • Jr Research Assistant - KSRM College of Engineering , India - [Oct 2013- Aug 2019]
